Posts.Content: Feel surreal about the whole diagnosis so know what you mean. I'm annoyed more than upset as it's such an inconvenience!! Decided I have two ways of looking at this. I can consider myself as suffering from cancer or living with it. I've chosen the later. Cancelled my sick note 5 wks after surgery and returned to work. Had my first chemo on Friday and feel ok. Just about to put my trainers on a put a few miles in with the dog before breakfast.Â
Posts.Title: Feeling nothing
